lines.text: [Serena is about to open the oven while the cookies are cooking - Rini swats her ahnd with a spatula]
Ow! What was that for? I have to check to make sure they don't burn!
Get your hands away! You're a lousy cook! I trust the recipe book, not you!

[bubes floating, off screen voice]
Sweeter that any candy, your smile can make the world a better place.

[points her sword at Pupulan]
Listen here, you clown! What are you doing with the children?
We-we're just letting them stay children forever here! What's the big deal! HOW CAN THAT BE WRONG!
[Pupulan plays his flute to attack until Uranus slashes his flute with her sword]
[Pupulan turns into a hummingbird and flies away]

[smiles]
I think it's a silly idea. Life is full of wonderful experiences, from the beginning to the end.
